description.short: Convert a decimal integer into binary.
description.full:
A [binary number](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binary_number), or 'base 2' number, is a value that's expressed using only two possible digits: 0 and 1. Write a function that accepts a positive integer as a parameter and returns its binary equivalent.
You cannot use `parseInt()` or `Number.prototype.toString()`.
